meanings.definition: Very small in size or stature.
meanings.sent1: The pintsize puppy fit in the palm of my hand.
meanings.sent2: The pintsize toy car easily fits in my pocket.
meanings.sent3: The pintsize kitten tried to climb the giant tree.
meanings.sent4: Her pintsize backpack held all her school supplies.
meanings.sent5: The pintsize flower bloomed beautifully in the garden.

meanings.definition: Of a size that is smaller than average.
meanings.sent1: The pintsize cupcakes were perfect for a quick snack.
meanings.sent2: The pintsize umbrella was ideal for light rain.
meanings.sent3: The pintsize elephant made everyone smile at the zoo.
meanings.sent4: His pintsize car zipped through the narrow streets.
meanings.sent5: The pintsize book was easy to carry in her bag.
